questions.question: What are the conditions to create a correct Umbraco api controller?
questions.answer: inherit from <class>Umbraco.Web.WebApi.UmbracoApiController</class> and suffix the name of the controller with ApiController.

questions.question: Are the UmbracoApiController autoruted?
questions.answer: Yes, you can find them under <route>~/Umbraco/Api/[YourControllerName]/[YourActionName]</route>

What are other advantages of inheriting from UmbracoApiController instead of regular WebAPI Controller?
questions.answer: Instant access to Umbraco helper and properties, like ContentServices, ContentTypeServices, MediaServices, etc.
